name: Python App Launcher
description: Brutally minimal multi-app launcher based on tKinter, Python

name: Keeper
description: A basic Google Keep clone written as practice for ReactJS

name: Pyssword Manager
description: Python based un-encrypted commandline password manager. Written as practice for SQL integration with Python

name: The Brown Fox
description: A simple typing game with a timer and a very minimal, aesthetically pleasing UI

name: Flutter Chat
description: A basic group chat application based on Flutter, Firebase and Material Design 3. Can be built for Android and iOS

name: Alt-Click to Copy
description: Plugin for Obsidian.md that quickly copies code snippets to the clipboard by holding the Alt modifier key. Built using TypeScript

name: Meditator
description: A minimal timer based meditation app that gamifies the acitivity. Points are scored when completing a meditation and lost when failed to do so. Based on Flutter and MaterialUI.
